data.title: Tesco buys remaining 50 per cent stake in iVillage
data.meta_description: Tesco has bought the remaining 50 per cent stake in women's website, iVillage. The company says that the deal will not affect the website'
data.text:
Liquid Death’s fame shows how badly marketers neglect product

Mark Ritson

It’s typical that marketers fawn over a brand built through promotion and packaging, when they ought to focus on their role in improving the thing they sell.

Marketoonist on brand storytelling

Georgie Chantrell-Plant

Tom Fishburne is founder of Marketoon Studios. Follow his work at marketoonist.com or on Twitter @tomfishburne See more of the Marketoonist here

Social change, budgets, work pressure: 5 interesting stats to start your week

Matthew Valentine

We arm you with all the numbers you need to tackle the week ahead.
